venue.name: Emerson Umbrella Center for the Arts

item.description:
**** Register Today! ****

Long-Pose Figure Study for Drawers and Painters

We provide the studio, model, easels, tables, and sculpture stands. There will be a single model every two consecutive weeks (5 models total). The first half hour of class will be shorter gesture poses, followed by two, one-hour poses. Bring your own supplies.

10 week class beginning April 11th; Thursday, 9:30 am-12:30 pm

Cost: $240 (includes model fees)

For more information or to register visit the EU website: http://www.emersonumbrella.org/classes/2013-spring-summer-adult-classes/#draw
item.name: Long-Pose Figure Study for Drawers and Painters at the Emerson Umbrella
